analysis.key_quote: Making NIH institute and Center directors political appointees will dramatically politicize the NIH, limit long-term planning and execution of important scientific programs, and increase employee turnover limiting the development of institutional and scientific knowledge critical to NIH function.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the politicization of the NIH and the detrimental impact on scientific integrity and institutional knowledge, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
